overviews.title: MBA in Digital Marketing: Course Fees, Admission 2026, Syllabus, Top Colleges, Career Scope
overview: Admission to MBA courses is done on the basis of scores obtained in several national and state-level entrance exams. The course fees in India is somewhere around Rs. 5 lakh to Rs. 25 lakh. Top colleges where one can study Digital Marketing courses are IIM Ahmedabad,  IIM Calcutta, IIM Indore, IIM Kashipur, etc.

Latest Updates for MBA in DM: The MAH MBA CET 2026 application form is expected to be available at the end of December 2025, and the session 1 exam for admission to MBA/PGDM and MMS courses will be conducted from Apr 6 to Apr 8, 2026.
MBA in Digital Marketing is at present the most sought-after area in MBA. Hence, interested students can read on to know the key highlights of the course.
Full-time, part-time, online, and distance learning modes
Digital Marketing Manager, Social Media Manager, Paid Media Manager/Specialist, Content Writer, Campaign Manager and SEO Manager
Sweans Technologies, EZ Rankings, IndeedSeo, Webmaxed, ThatWare LLP, etc.
Chandigarh University, Amity University, IMT Ghaziabad, Lovely Professional University , IIM Bodh Gaya, etc.

highlights.Education modes: Full-time, part-time, online, and distance learning modes
highlights.Entrance Exams: CAT, CMAT, Symbiosis Entrance Test, MAH CET, etc.
highlights.Course Fees: INR 2 lakh to INR 15 Lakh and above
highlights.Job Profiles: Digital Marketing Manager, Social Media Manager, Paid Media Manager/Specialist, Content Writer, Campaign Manager and SEO Manager
highlights.Top Recruiters: Sweans Technologies, EZ Rankings, IndeedSeo, Webmaxed, ThatWare LLP, etc.
highlights.Best Colleges: Chandigarh University, Amity University, IMT Ghaziabad, Lovely Professional University , IIM Bodh Gaya, etc.

description: The MBA in Digital Marketing eligibility criteria are the same as the MBA . Given below are the minimum eligibility criteria:
criteria_points: Complete the graduation from a recognized university
admission_process: - Check the course eligibility and make sure you fulfill the same.
- Fill out the college application forms.
- Prepare and appear for the entrance test.
- When the results are out you will check your scores or rank.
- By paying the admission fee you'll confirm your enrollment.

faqs.question: Is MBA in Digital Marketing a good course to choose? What is its scope in future?
faqs.answer: There are many reasons why an MBA in Digital Marketing is a good course to choose in today's era. The past decade has seen digital marketing see massive growth. Digital marketing, from social media to SEO, is having a beneficial effect on billions of people every day. Enhanced capabilities in digital marketing will help businesses get an edge in the marketplace. Small companies and startups may now boost their return on investment and launch successful advertising campaigns thanks to digital marketing. The effectiveness of digital marketing methods will increase with time, allowing businesses to fully use AI, SEO, AR, and VR. Many current strategies for digital advertising have yet to prove their worth. The new wave of digital marketing, in contrast to the old method, is based entirely on the actions of the target audience. Innovative digital marketing strategies will help firms to establish new standards.

faqs.question: Is MBA in digital marketing a valid course?
faqs.answer: Yes, MBA in digital marketing is a valid course and is a good option as a subject and will definitely open various opportunities for your career. It is advisable to do research on the course offered by a particular university regarding its recognition status, reviews by previous students, etc. before joining the course.

faqs.question: What is MBA in Digital Marketing?
faqs.answer: MBA in Digital Marketing is a two-year professional program designed by industry experts to benefit young professionals and provide them with detailed knowledge. MBA Digital Marketing is regarded as one of the most searched MBA degrees. Students in the MBA in Digital Marketing are prepared for a job in the field of technology and innovation. In today's time, almost every company relies on Digital Marketing plans for promoting their products and services. Digital Marketing is a mode of marketing through the internet, search engines, social media, emails, mobile apps, mobile games, and other such channels to reach a large number of customers and increase sales. The most common Digital Marketing channels are Website Marketing, Content Marketing, Email Marketing, Social Media Marketing, Affiliate Marketing, Video Marketing, Pay-Per-Click (PPC) Advertising, and SMS Messaging.

faqs.question: Why to study an MBA Digital Marketing course?
faqs.answer: The growing use of the internet has highlighted the need for the promotion of products through digital platforms. By pursuing an MBA in digital marketing , students will be able to enhance their managerial and administration skills. MBA in Digital Marketing will also open new avenues for them in the industry and they can find employment in top companies and serve in various positions like a content writer, social media manager, content0 manager, and digital marketing manager. MBA degree will also help students refine their problem-solving skills and give them a more professional outlook towards the upcoming challenges.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility for MBA in Digital Marketing course?
faqs.answer: Aspirants, who want to shape their careers in the Marketing field, can opt for this course and gain detailed knowledge related to the field. An MBA in Digital Marketing is best suited for individuals who have strong leadership abilities and wish to enter the management or marketing industry. The importance of Marketing is increasing day-by-day and more and more people are willing to enter this industry which carries a bright scope for the future. The professionals can even begin their businesses and apply this learning to the actual work to fetch better revenues. Students who have finished their graduation can enroll themselves in this program. Work experience of a few years is preferred by the colleges.

syllabus_section.title: MBA in Digital Marketing Syllabus
description: MBA in Digital Marketing syllabus includes subjects related to general business management and topics specific to digital marketing. Digital Marketing MBA is a two-year master’s course. The MBA in Digital Marketing syllabus is divided into four semesters. The MBA in Digital Marketing subjects may, however, be covered in slightly different ways at various colleges and universities.

faqs.question: Does MBA in Digital Marketing syllabus have a Mathematics subject?
faqs.answer: Almost every MBA course has some sort of Mathematics in its curriculum. In the MBA in Digital Marketing, you'll get to study Management Accounting, Business Analytics , etc., subjects that may contain some amount of mathematical aspects. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

faqs.question: Which is better among MBA in Digital Marketing and MBA in Marketing?
faqs.answer: MBA in Digital Marketing is primarily centered on digital marketing strategies, which include social media marketing, search engine optimization (SEO), content marketing, email marketing, and data analytics. A traditional MBA in Marketing covers a wide range of marketing topics, including product marketing, market research, consumer behavior, branding, and strategy. Candidates can check the table below to see the comparison between the two. salary_section.title: MBA in Digital Marketing Career Scope: Job Profiles, Salary and Top Recruiters
core_industries: They are responsible for managing and executing social media strategies for businesses or organizations.
A Paid Media Manager is a professional responsible for creating and implementing digital marketing campaigns to drive traffic, generate leads, and increase revenue for a company.

A Campaign Manager is a professional responsible for overseeing and coordinating the planning, execution, and evaluation of a specific campaign or project within the context of media management, public relations, advertising, or politics.
An SEO Manager is a professional responsible for overseeing and implementing search engine optimization (SEO) strategies for a website or multiple websites.
A marketing professional who is responsible for developing and implementing digital marketing strategies to promote a company's products or services online.

faqs.question: What are the top job profiles offered to MBA in Digital Marketing student?
faqs.answer: The top MBA in Digital Marketing job profiles in India include Digital Marketing Manager, Content Marketing, SEO Manager, Social Media Manager, Media Strategist, Advertising Manager, Business Analyst, Email Marketer, Content Writer , etc. Many companies hire students for these roles as both freelancers and full-time employees.

faqs.question: What is the average salary offered to MBA in Digital Marketing student in India?
faqs.answer: The average salary of a Digital Marketing Manager in India is INR 11.6 LPA . The salary depends on various factors like recruiting company, job location, skills, experience, etc.

faqs.question: What are the benefits of pursuing MBA in Digital Marketing?
faqs.answer: There are countless reasons why pursuing an MBA in Digital Marketing will be beneficial to you: First, the digital industry is booming at a pace. The increase in demand for digital marketers, content creators, marketing professionals , etc., has grown the value of the degree. The digital market is completely online and the major employment options for digital marketers are flexible. So, the chances of flexible working schedules and locations will be higher in this field. An MBA in Digital Marketing will not only help you in understanding marketing concepts but will also enhance your business administration skills.

faq_section.title: FAQs on MBA in Digital Marketing
introduction: Candidates can refer to this section for MBA in Digital Marketing related FAQs .

faqs.question: What are the pros and cons of offline MBA in Digital Marketing?
faqs.answer: There are always some pros and cons while pursuing a course. So, here are some positives and negatives of an offline MBA in Digital Marketing course: Pros: Cons: List: You'll get to meet your professors and peers in person which will grow your network and enhance your communication and networking skills.; Offline course will offer hands-on learning. You'll get to face real-world situations and work on them.; Instant feedback from teachers will help you improve and understand better. List: Offline course won't be as flexible as an online course. You'll need to come to the college, attend classes on time, and fulfill the attendance requriements.; Offline courses are a bit more expensive than online courses as they provide physical classes, workshops, seminars, etc., for effective learning.

faqs.question: Whose salary is more, an MBA in Digital Marketing or an MCA?
faqs.answer: MBA in Digital Marketing or an MCA (Master of Computer Applications) salary in India can vary significantly depending on several factors, including the specific job role, years of experience, the organization, location, and the demand for the skill set. Here are the approximate average salaries that both graduates earn: Courses Entry-Level Mid-Level Senior-Level MBA in Digital Marketing INR 4-6 LPA INR 8-5 LPA INR 15-30 LPA MCA INR 3-7 LPA INR 7-12 LPA INR 12-20 LPA Table: Courses | Entry-Level | Mid-Level | Senior-Level || MBA in Digital Marketing | INR 4-6 LPA | INR 8-5 LPA | INR 15-30 LPA || MCA | INR 3-7 LPA | INR 7-12 LPA | INR 12-20 LPA

faqs.question: How can a degree in MBA Digital Marketing be beneficial for me?
faqs.answer: The degree in MBA Digital Marketing beneficial for you because the importance of an MBA in Digital Marketing has increased significantly in recent years. It helps the brand to identify its target audience and approach them for advertisement and promotion of its products through various digital methods. The growing use of the internet has necessitated the need for such marketing strategies. The companies identify their target market and popularise their products on social media mediums, where over 65 percent of the population spends their maximum time.

faqs.question: Is it beneficial to do digital marketing course for an MBA student? If yes, how?
faqs.answer: Hi, If you select marketing specialization in MBA , a subject of digital marketing is included. In today’s world due to the advent of internet the traditional marketing technique success rate is diminishing. Here, what comes the digital marketing to make internet a good platform for marketing. For an MBA students, it is more beneficial.

faqs.question: Which course is better to pursue among Digital Marketing and Social Media Marketing?
faqs.answer: Digital marketing skills are flexible and are applicable in multiple industries and roles. It helps you to learn the skills that are important for starting your own business or freelancing. The field is evolving rapidly which demands learning and adaptation to new trends and techs that too continuously. On the other hand, Social Media Marketing is a marketing strategy that leverages social media platforms to achieve marketing and business objectives, such as brand promotion and customer engagement. Candidates can check the table below to see the key highlights of both courses. faqs.question: Is Digital Marketing with Marketing a good combination for MBA?
faqs.answer: Yes, digital marketing is a good option in combination to MBA in marketing. Every MNC has created a separate sub department of digital marketing in their marketing department, which focusses on marketing through digital media. They focus on SEO and SMO. You will get more job opportunities with digital marketing. You can opt for international business as well.

syllabus.title: MBA in Digital Marketing Syllabus & Subjects 2026: Download Semester-wise PDF, Important Books
introduction: MBA is one of the most popular courses worldwide. MBA in Digital Marketing is a PG course that is quite popular among youngsters who wish to start their career in the digital marketing field. As most organisations prefer to promote their brands and products/services through digital mediums, Digital Marketing has become an exciting discipline from a career point of view. The syllabus of MBA in Digital Marketing includes subjects that provide knowledge about affiliate marketing, SEO, email marketing, content creation, etc.

sections.title: List of Subjects in MBA Digital Marketing
description: Given below is the list of core subjects included in the syllabus of MBA Digital Marketing programme.
Given below is the list of elective subjects included in the syllabus of MBA in Digital Marketing programme:

core_subjects.Subject Details: The basic concepts of accounting, standard costing, financial statements, cost accounting, etc. are covered in this subject.
Important theories, frameworks, terminologies, models, etc. in organisational behaviour are covered in this subject.
The key concepts in microeconomics from a managerial point of view are explained through this subject.
The various concepts related to scientific business research are explained in this subject.
The different concepts associated with functions, frameworks, and roles of marketing are discussed in this subject.
Frameworks of mobile, social, and e-commerce are explained in this subject.
This subject covers vital terms of marketing management, offerings, the role of communication elements, etc.
The main concepts of financial management, such as capital structure, working capital, financial statement analysis, etc. are covered in this subject.
Human Resource functions such as talent acquisition, employee retention, etc. are explained in this subject.
An understanding of the strategy creation process, benefits of strategy management, and related concepts are covered in this subject.
A scientific approach to decision-making is taught to the students through this subject.
This subject explains the ethos of business and management in India and business ethics.

elective_subjects.Subject Details: The various approaches and competencies of management are enlisted in this subject.
This subject deals with the economic issues prevalent in India and the present situation of the Indian economy.
The attributes of entrepreneurs and the factors that affect entrepreneurial growth are discussed in this subject.
The definition of psychology and its role in managers' behaviour and decision-making ability are discussed in this subject.
This subject deals with the rules and laws that govern any business.
This subject focuses on the qualitative research methods that can redefine business management.
The inter-relationship between government, business, and society are explained in this subject.
This subject focuses on re-engineering concepts that are used to redefine business processes.
The economical factors that influence international business are discussed in this subject.

sections.title: Detailed Syllabus for MBA Digital Marketing
description: The syllabus for the MBA in Digital Marketing can differ for different colleges. Though the core concepts and teaching methods are quite same, there might be variations in the curriculum design and execution. A detailed overview of the course syllabus is given in the below table -

core_subjects.Subject Details: The different forms of business organisation, the significance of accounting in business, and the associated theories and concepts are covered in this subject.
The implications of organisational behaviour from the point of view of managers, leaders, employees, and other stakeholders are explained in this subject.
The importance of business decision making and various aspects of microeconomics are discussed in this subject.
The business research methods from scientific and data-driven perspectives are covered in this subject.
The basics of marketing in today’s context are explained in this subject.
This subject explains how to conduct a business digitally with the help of different online platforms.
This subject will discuss 4 Ps of marketing and their concepts.
Human Resource Management focuses on improving employee retention and performing other duties of the human resource team.
The impact of operations and supply chain management on various aspects of the business are discussed in this subject.
The components of the strategic management model are explained in detail in this subject.
The science of decision-making is explained through this subject.
Evaluating the performance of an enterprise with respect to various marketing and business perspectives, are discussed in detail in this subject.
The work ethics, business ethics, etc. from the perspective of the Indian markets, are covered in this subject.
The definition, uses, and benefits of search-engine marketing are explained in this subject.
The concept and meaning of mobile marketing and its benefits are explained in this subject.
The concept of email marketing, its benefits, and its applications are covered in this subject.
The meaning of content marketing and its benefits are discussed in this subject.
The meaning, benefits, and methods of affiliate marketing are discussed in this subject.
The case studies in digital marketing are covered in this subject.

career.title: Career After MBA Digital Marketing: Salary 2026, Jobs, Top Recruiters, Placements
overview: A Career in MBA in Digital Marketing is increasingly growing due to the increased market competition and low cost involved in various digital marketing strategies. Before the 21st century, print media was used as a major means to market organizations. But with the advent of technology and increased growth of social media platforms and their impact on influencing the consumer, MBAs in  Digital Marketing careers are gaining greater reverence providing ample opportunities to candidates.

Candidates can choose to work under the core domain of Digital Marketing or choose to pursue one specialization like Social Media Marketing, Email Marketing , Content Marketing , or Paid Search under the umbrella term Digital Marketing. Further, there are opportunities in both government and private sectors. MBA in Digital Marketing can be pursued as an extension to BBA in Digital Marketing to enhance one’s skills and knowledge and provide better financial opportunities at the same time.

MBA in Digital Marketing Salary is appealing to freshers as well as experienced candidates. The average salary ranges from INR 2 lakh- to INR 30 lakh depending on skillset and years of experience. MBA in Digital Marketing Scope is very wide and the candidates have the opportunity to get recruited at the top organizations, including some of the best digital marketing agencies like Pulp Strategy and Red Dash Media .

Some of the top job profiles individuals can pursue after completing MBA in Digital Marketing include Marketing Manager, Social Media Manager, Public Relations Manager, and Digital Strategist . To know more about the upcoming future trends and growth avenues in MBA Digital Marketing keep reading the article.

MBA in Digital Marketing is one of the top emerging marketing fields , and there is a great demand for professionals who understand the use and operation of social media and other digital platforms for marketing a product or service. Career prospects after completing the MBA in Digital Marketing are very good as there is a high demand for digital marketing professionals in IT, e-Commerce, FMCG, Goods and Services, Manufacturing, BFSI, and Sales & Marketing . Individuals also have the opportunity to work at some of the best MNCs and top private organizations to have a fulfilling job and career in MBA Digital Marketing . Some of the top profiles one can undertake after completing MBA in Digital Marketing along with their salaries are mentioned in the table below:
Note: The average salary has been taken from Ambitionbox.com .
Top MBA Entrance Exams 2025: Exam Dates, Registration, Fees, Difficulty Level
List of IIMs in India: Rankings, Courses, Fees & Seat Intake

The scope of MBA in Digital Marketing is very wide offering multiple opportunities to candidates after pursuing the course. They can prepare for competitive exams, pursue courses for upskilling, or take a full-time job based on their professional pursuits. sections.title: MBA in Digital Marketing Career: Quick Facts

value: MBA in Digital Marketing Job Roles
They are responsible for managing and executing social media strategies for businesses or organizations.
A Paid Media Manager is a professional responsible for creating and implementing digital marketing campaigns to drive traffic, generate leads, and increase revenue for a company.

A Campaign Manager is a professional responsible for overseeing and coordinating the planning, execution, and evaluation of a specific campaign or project within the context of media management, public relations, advertising, or politics.
An SEO Manager is a professional responsible for overseeing and implementing search engine optimization (SEO) strategies for a website or multiple websites.
A marketing professional who is responsible for developing and implementing digital marketing strategies to promote a company's products or services online.

addmision.title: MBA in Digital Marketing Admission 2026: Dates, Eligibility, Fees, & Selection Process
overview: Admission to MBA in Digital Marketing is similar to any other MBA program. To be eligible to pursue an MBA in Digital Marketing, one must have completed graduation in any stream with an aggregate of Entrance exams conducted at the national, state, and university levels . Some of the commonly accepted entrance exams include CAT, XAT, MAT, SNAP, and CMAT . Some of the top colleges offering MBA in Digital Marketing include prestigious universities like the Indian Institute of Technology (IIT), Indian Institute of Management (IIM) , LPU, IMT Ghaziabad , and Chandigarh University . The average fees range from I NR 1 - 11 lakh .

MBA in Digital Marketing is a 2-year postgraduate degree program focusing on providing comprehensive knowledge regarding different marketing tools on a digital level to promote a product or service. MBA in Digital Marketing to curriculum includes subjects like content strategy , email marketing , and social media marketing . With 197 colleges providing MBA in Digital Marketing specialization, this course is so much in demand due to the rising demand for skilled online marketing professionals. Read more to know more about MBA in Digital Marketing admission 2025.
MBA in Digital Marketing Latest Updates:
The CAT 2025 registration is now open for admission to MBA/PGDM courses. The last date to register is Sep 13, 2025 . Furthermore, the CAT 2025 exam is scheduled to be held on Nov 30, 2025 .

The MAT September 2025 registration process is now open for both PBT and CBT modes. The last date to register for PBT is Sep 15, 2025, and for CBT is Sep 22, 2025 . Furthermore, the MAT 2025 PBT and CBT exams will be held on Sep 21, 2025, and Sep 28, 2025 , respectively.
The XAT registration process 2026 is now open for MBA/PGDM courses. The last date to register is Dec 5, 2025. Furthermore, the XAT 2026 exam will be held on January 4, 2026 .

sections.heading: General Eligibility Criteria for MBA Digital Marketing

content.text: The admission procedure for the MBA in Digital Marketing relies on entrance exam performance or merit along with personal interviews and group discussions. The Eligibility criteria for MBA Digital Marketing is same as the MBA . Candidates can find the minimum criteria below:

items: The candidate must have completed graduation or equivalent from a recognized university.
The bachelor’s degree can be in any course from the three streams – Arts, Commerce, and Science.
There is a minimum percentage criterion in most of the colleges. The minimum aggregate required in graduation is 50 percent for General/OBC category candidates and 45 percent for SC/ST candidates.
Some colleges want students to have English as a compulsory subject in high school.

sections.heading: MBA in Digital Marketing Admission Process 2025

content.text: The standard admission procedure for almost every college is the same and students can check the below points to get a general idea.
The basic admission procedure for practically every college is the same, and students can gain a rough understanding by reviewing the items below.

items: Candidates need to first shortlist which college or institute they want to apply to. Candidates must then review the requirements for the entrance exam. Most institutes adhere to the minimum graduation score criteria of 50% average or equivalent from an accredited university.
The minimum aggregate score for reserved category students is 45 percent. Candidates must next assess whether they are qualified to apply to that particular institution or not.
Applicants must fill out an application form and pay the necessary fees. Then, they need to prepare for the entrance exams. Only a good score will help them in getting admission to good colleges.
Candidates can later check their exam results and if they’re through they can complete the remaining steps.

sections.heading: MBA in Digital Marketing Admissions 2025: Entrance Exams Syllabus

content.text: Before appearing for the exam, or even before starting the preparation one needs to go through the syllabus of entrance exams. The table below mentions some of the important management exams and their syllabus respectively. To get a better understanding of the same, refer to the table.

rows: MBA in Digital Marketing Entrance Exam
MBA in Digital Marketing Entrance Exam Syllabus

The CAT exam syllabus includes three subjects – Verbal Ability & Reading Comprehension (VARC), Data Interpretation & Logical Reasoning (DILR), and Quantitative Aptitude (QA). The main topics of focus while covering the CAT syllabus are Arithmetic, Algebra, Geometry, Percentages, Graphs, English Grammar, Coding-Decoding, Series Completion, etc.

MAT Syllabus includes Language Comprehension, Intelligence and Critical Reasoning, Data Analysis and Sufficiency, Mathematical Skills, and Indian and Global Environment. The syllabus for MAT has been designed to check the candidate’s analytical skills, logical aptitude, English comprehension, and general awareness.
The XAT exam syllabus includes topics from decision-making, Verbal & Logical Ability, Quantitative Ability & Data Interpretation, and General Knowledge.
CMAT Syllabus consists of five subjects – Quantitative Techniques & Data Interpretation, Logical Reasoning, Language Comprehension, General Awareness, and Innovation & Entrepreneurship.
SNAP syllabus includes topics from General English, Quantitative Ability, and Reasoning like other entrance exam syllabus.

content.text: Note: This information is sourced from the official website of the institute/exam and may vary.

sections.heading: MBA Digital Marketing Admission 2025: Quick Preparation Tips

content.text: Preparing for any MBA specialization is not an easy task. Candidates need to be focused and determined to excel in the entrance exam to pursue an MBA in Digital Marketing Course . Applicants should adjust their strategy based on the exam's format. The general preparation approach for all MBA entrance exams is given below:

items: Identify Requirements : Before applying to a college for MBA admission, students must have a thorough awareness of the requirements and accepted test scores for that institution.
Entrance Exams : The aspirants should understand which colleges accept which entrance tests and then plan their whole preparation according to their preferences for colleges.
Select Specialisation : The candidates need to select their MBA specialization and program from among the numerous prestigious B-schools in India.
Calculate Fees : The aspirants should also be aware of the updated fee structure of the MBA in Digital Marketing program before taking admission to any college.

AICTE/UGC Approved Institutes : The candidates should also be aware of the colleges that are approved by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE)/University Grants Commission (UGC) as it increases the reliability of the institute.
Know exam patterns and the weightage of various sections in the examination as well as the negative marking and time limit for various examinations.
Understand and memorize the syllabus thoroughly to prepare a strategy for the easy and difficult topics and analyze the most important and mark-fetching areas in exams.
Refer to limited sources to avoid confusion and clear the basic concepts. Candidates can refer to basic books for Reasoning and Verbal Ability and refer to guidebooks for Management aptitude.
Prepare a timetable to prioritize the important subjects and cover all topics for reading as well as revisions.
Refer to PYQs to understand the difficulty of the examination and prepare effectively for the most repeated areas.
Solve Mock Tests to gauge preparation and increase the ability to attempt more and reduce wrong attempts.

QA_ALL.description: Get insights from 745 questions on Digital Marketing, answered by students, alumni, and experts. You may also ask and answer any question you like about Digital Marketing

questions.question_text: Who is eligible for BA Graphic Design and Digital Marketing at Manipal Institute of Communication?

answers.answer_text: Candidates must pass Class 12 or equivalent from a recognised board to apply for BA Graphic Design and Digital Marketing at Manipal Institute of Communication. Aspirants also need to appear for a Home-Based Test followed by a PI round to get admission in this course.

questions.question_text: What is the scope of digital marketing.

answers.answer_text: The scope of digital marketing is growing rapidly as businesses move toward online platforms to reach their customers. With increasing internet usage, smartphones, and social media, digital marketing has become essential for brand visibility, lead generation, and sales growth. Today, businesses of all sizes use digital channels to connect with their target audience more effectively than traditional marketing methods. Digital marketing offers a wide range of opportunities through services such as search engine optimization (SEO), social media marketing, pay-per-click advertising (PPC), content marketing, and email marketing. These strate

questions.question_text: Which is a better career option M.Com or Digital marketing.

answers.answer_text: Hey, Since you have a B.Com and are good at accounting, you already have a strong foundation. But if you are more interested in digital marketing than doing M.Com, it makes sense to follow what excites you. You can start learning digital marketing through courses and practical work, while using your commerce knowledge as an added strength. This way, you can build a career in a field you enjoy without losing the advantage of your accounting background.

questions.question_text: Can you suggest some of the best Digital Marketing Companies?

answers.answer_text: Yes sure, There are many digital marketing companies in India. You can check out the list of agencies along with their primary focus and tools that they are famous for in the table below for your reference - Agency Primary Focus Notable Tool/Feature WebFX Revenue & AI MarketingCloudFX NP Digital Content & Authority Ubersuggest Integration Oxygenites Ethical SEO & Leads Search Everywhere Strategy Thrive Holistic Presence Thrive Score Disruptive Paid Performance Account Audit Specialists Source - External sites

questions.question_text: I'm planning to go for MBA in Digital Marketing, but there are many online programs. Is it better to do this course from Chandigarh Uni.?

answers.answer_text: Hey, Doing an MBA in Digital Marketing from Chandigarh University Online is a good option if you want, A recognised MBA degree that is valid for jobs and higher studies. Flexibility to study while working Knowledge of both management and digital marketing. But it may not be the best if you want only practical skills or top company placements, because online programs are more theoretical and placement support can vary.

questions.question_text: What would be the salary of a fresher in digital marketing?

answers.answer_text: A fresher in digital marketing usually earns between 15000 and 25000 per month. in bigger cities, it can go up to 20000 to 30000, while in small cities or startups, it's often around 10000 to 18000. Learning skills like SEO, social media, google ads, or content creation can help you earn more.

questions.question_text: Which are the best digital marketing institutes in Kolkata? What are the job opportunities and salary offered to a fresher?

answers.answer_text: Some of the best digital marketing institute in kolkata are NYD India, W3webschool, IDCM, NIHT Digital marketiing, Skill Circle, Seven Boats Academy and Digital Spinner Academy.  They give practical training, real projects and help with job placements. Fresher can work as Digital Marketing Executive, SEO Executive, Social Media Executive or Content Marketing Executive. The starting salary is usually 1.8L - 3.5L per year, and it can increase with experience and certifications.

questions.question_text: Does the Digital Marketing curriculum at AAFT include AI-driven marketing, automation tools, and analytics training?

tags.tag_name: Asian Academy of Film And Television

author.name: heena agrawaltry to give best solution..

answers.answer_text: Hi. Yes, The B.Sc in Digital Marketing at AAFT includes a “Web Analytics and Tools” subject (Semester 4) — which means students learn about analytics and presumably use analytics software/tools. The curriculum also covers Online / Display / Media‑Buying Marketing, Programmatic Ads, Lead‑Generation and Funnel Management, Affiliate Marketing, Email Marketing — these are domains where marketing automation and data‑tracking are relevant. Under “Skills Acquisition, ” AAFT lists “Analytics and Reporting, ” “UX / UI Basics, ” “Content Creation, ” “Branding and Storytelling” — indicating a mix of creative

questions.question_text: Which is the best Digital marketing institute in Kochi?

answers.answer_text: Skillfloor is considered one of the best digital marketing institutes in Kochi because it offers easy-to-understand training, practical projects, and expert guidance, helping students build real digital marketing skills and prepare confidently for job opportunities.
